Week 9 - More on Maps and Network Visualization

Outline of Topics

This week our objectives will be to (1) spend more time looking at different kinds of map visualizations, (2) weâ€™ll introduce the topics of networks and think about how to visualize them.

Map Viz Motivation: examples of mappable data and even more examples of data on maps.

Network Viz Motivation: social networks and many network viz platforms.

  • Lecture
    1. Review of map data & visualizations from last week
    2. Discussion of networks and how they are visualized
  • Programming
    1. More ways to visualize maps (bqplot.MarketMap)
      • want to look at code examples before class? bqplot MarketMap notebook
    2. Visualizing networks (bqplot.Graph)
      • want to look at code examples before class? bqplot Graph notebook
